pages.text: Final product of BambooLight Blade are called Silver BambooLight.$(br)Blades, using egg white as glue, are covered with Iron foil or silver foil.$(br2)Laymen will mistake these blades as steel ones, which shows the brilliant technique of Silver BambooLights' smithing.
Kill 100 creatures then break the Blade, and it will turn into a mysterious Sheath, which is a necessary to make high-tier Blades.
